nodes.text: Arkanis was the sector capital of the Arkanis sector. It was inhabited by Humans such as Devon Fuller. It was the throneworld of the Arkanis Regency, which included the ancient Empress Teeda. The planet was part of the Galactic Empire. It was the location of Vensenor Flight Academy.
During the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the Exchange attempted to deliver lethal weapons to mercenaries on Arkanis.
